name: ISENSE CLRT System
shortDescription: Full Body Auto Immersion with patented active sensing technology that automatically adjusts pressure in real time to enhance patient comfort and clinical outcomes.
description: The ISENSE® & ISENSE® CLRT Systems are state-of-the-art therapeutic surfaces designed to provide superior pressure redistribution and patient comfort. Utilizing advanced sensor technology, these systems continuously monitor and adjust to the patient's position and weight, ensuring optimal pressure relief across five distinct zones.
additionalFeatures: Quick-release CPR valve for rapid deflation
Quiet operation for better patient sleep

name: ITURN CLRT System
shortDescription: Advanced turning system for critical care patients requiring frequent repositioning to prevent pressure ulcers.
description: The ITURN CLRT System is specifically engineered for patients who are unable to turn themselves. It features programmable turning cycles that can be customized to meet individual patient needs, significantly reducing the risk of hospital-acquired pressure ulcers.

name: SMARTMATT
shortDescription: Smart pressure redistribution mattress with integrated sensors for real-time monitoring.
description: SMARTMATT represents the next generation of smart hospital mattresses. With built-in pressure sensors, it provides caregivers with real-time data on patient positioning and pressure points, allowing for proactive care and intervention.
additionalFeatures: High-density foam base for bottom-out protection

name: SMARTURN
shortDescription: Intelligent turning system with integrated patient monitoring.
description: SMARTURN combines turning technology with patient monitoring to provide a comprehensive solution for immobile patients. It tracks patient movement and weight changes, alerts caregivers to potential issues, and automates the turning process.
additionalFeatures: Battery backup for up to 4 hours

name: INTELLIMATT
shortDescription: Intelligent surface with predictive analytics for pressure ulcer prevention.
description: INTELLIMATT uses predictive analytics to identify patients at high risk for pressure ulcers before they develop. By analyzing pressure patterns over time, it helps caregivers implement preventative measures more effectively.
additionalFeatures: Automatic calibration for different patient sizes
Quiet air pump with low vibration

name: ZMATT
shortDescription: Zero-pressure mattress system designed for maximum immersion.
description: ZMATT is designed to achieve true zero pressure in critical areas. By cycling air through different cells, it ensures that no part of the body is subjected to persistent pressure, facilitating faster healing of existing ulcers.

name: DX & Z-TURN
description: The DX & Z-TURN system offers both lateral rotation and deep cell decompression in one unit. This versatility makes it suitable for a wide range of patients, from those requiring simple repositioning to those with stage IV pressure ulcers.

name: K-11 FOAM MATTRESS REPLACEMENT
shortDescription: High-quality foam mattress replacement with multi-zone support.
description: The K-11 Foam Mattress Replacement provides an economical yet effective solution for pressure redistribution. Its multi-zone foam core is engineered to provide varying levels of support to different parts of the body, with a specific focus on heel protection.
